header.strSummary:
Product developer with
experience in introducing new capabilities to meet the needs of clients and
organizations with an entrepreneur's enthusiasm, versatility, collaborative
approach, and burning desire to solve any problem big or small. Addresses
business problems head-on by designing and implementing innovative technology
solutions. Excited by the opportunity to build software products that truly impact people.
header.strResumeTitle: Product Development, IT Consulting, and Sales

sections.strDescription:
Booster is a resume hosting
platform designed to allow job applicants to clearly link their skills with
their experience and allow employers to quickly and quantitatively match job
applicants to positions.  I personally
performed all design, development, testing, and related technical efforts.  I also performed all business-related activities such as ensuring legal viability, performing market research, acting as a product advocate, procuring various services, and developing all related documentation.  Highlights of this effort include:

impacts.impactText: Developed fundamental account management capabilities including account request, account validation, and password reset.
Built the product according to a three tiered structure: Web Front End, Application  Tier, and Database
Recorded video clip to explain how to tag resumes to promote correct usage by job applicants
Act as tech support through ZenDesk chat program
Developed custom algorithm to translate relationships between skills and experience into quantified experience index.
Developed an intuitive, natural user experience
Leveraged the Spring framework for for product development including Spring Security and Web MVC.
Iterated on specific functionality as well as general capabilities in response to product performance and usage
Performed direct market research, finding and approaching employer and applicant user groups in various forums to validate product-market fit
Booster is hosted on AWS

Developed "View" Capability: The view capability allows job applicants to create a version of their resume already filtered for the keywords specific to a particular job opening.  They can then establish a custom link that shows this view or print out .pdf versions of the resume view using the native browser printing capabilities. The view capability is durable, being able to handle link deletion, resume changes, or view changes even after a custom link has been shared.
Built logging capability to support debugging and issue analysis of the production environment.
Wrote stored procedures for all database calls to promote resistance to SQL injection attacks

sections.strDescription: NewStar Systems was founded to bring Booster to market.  Booster is a resume web platform that helps applicants demonstrate that they have the skills employers are looking for and helps employers find the experience they're looking for faster and more thoroughly.

impacts.impactText: Identified appropriate technical architecture changes and allocated resources to affect those changes.
Determined strategic direction and identified tactical steps require to pursue the related goals
Hired six contractors: two Front End developers, one back end developer, one UI designer, one marketing consultant, one product manager.
Moving authentication to JWT-based instead of session-based.
Enhancing existing and adding new front end functionality based on Vue.JS capabilities

Migrating the platform from the prototype architecture (Java Spring 4.3 rendering .jsp files) to modern architecture: separate front end built on Vue.JS with a separate back end upgraded to Spring Boot.
Financed entire effort including paying for contractors, software and hosting services, and other incidental expenses
Identified and engaged key people in target user groups to understand product-market fit and identified appropriate improvements
Designed two integration points between the Armys Financial System and other feeder systems
Facilitated issue identification, analysis, and resolution through both face-to-face interaction with end users and independent system investigation
Built consensus among stakeholders from different parts of client organizations
Guided users through discrete activities as performed in the new system
Distinguished between issues that result from incorrect usage from those that result from true bugs and coordinating the efforts necessary to resolve both types of issues
Supported testing of multiple other integration points, including the points that handle tracking of all the Armys Civilian Payroll entries.
Facilitated the identification of opportunities for improvements in current processes
Provided high-level understanding of how the systems functions, models, and workflows relate to end user tasks and responsibilities
Provided detailed instructions for the build team to create the necessary custom components which would automate the movement of data between systems
Coordinated a team of three in providing support to end users at a large Army installation
Identified need for and provided ad-hoc instructor-led trainings

sections.strDescription: As a member of the General Fund Enterprise Business System (GFEBS) System Support and Operations (SSO) team, my primary goal is to address issues users encounter while using GFEBS, one of the Army's major financial accounting systems.  Issue are submitted to the SSO team through a ticketing system.  Those tickets are then sent to the appropriate subteams.  I work on the cost subteam, and I focus specifically on the interface between the Defense Travel System (DTS) and GFEBS.

impacts.impactText: Developed a small database to automatically perform data validation previously being handled manually.  This database will reduce team workload by over 60 hours per week and reduce work on the part of the GFEBS users by over 18,000 hours.
Identifies systemic problems and proposes appropriate system and process changes.
Develops job aids to ensure expected system usage is understood and followed correctly.
Acts as subject matter expert for the DTS interface with GFEBS
Developing a small custom data analysis tool to simplify and speed up user support efforts.
Analyzes and develops solutions for end user issues arising from edge case usage scenarios.
Reduced project size and costs by doing all delivery activities (requirements analysis, design, configuration, validation, training, and deployment) as well as custom development
Managed projects to ensure contractual obligations were met, revenue was booked, and scope creep was met with appropriate business development
Managed all aspects of Project Server implementation and served as resident technical expert on sales calls
Designed and built Hammerhead functionality based on feedback from clients and requests during sales presentations increasing product appeal at reduced cost
Managed project financials for my own active projects ensuring forecast revenue was received in the appropriate time frame
Identified opportunities within accounts and consistently won additional work worth up to 50% of the original contract amount
Increased sales by developing prospect-specific demonstrations with custom components that illustrated more of MS Project Servers potential
Served as project executive by managing the relationship between Projility and clients and providing guidance to consultants through all project delivery activities.
Managed all aspects of Project Server implementations and served as resident technical expert on sales calls
Increased sales by developing prospect-specific demonstrations with custom components that illustrated more of MS Project Servers potential
Managed projects to ensure contractual obligations were met, revenue was booked, and scope creep was met with appropriate business development
Created standardized pricing model for all engagements enabling data driven negotiations and consistent estimates given from multiple consultants
Managed project financials for all projects ensuring forecast revenue was received in the appropriate time frame
Managed and mentored 10 direct reports resulting in an expansion of employee focus to sales and business development in addition to high quality delivery
Architected and scoped over $2.5 million in projects
Designed and built Hammerhead functionality based on feedback from clients and requests during sales presentations increasing product appeal at reduced cost
Developed standard sales demo that reduced the cost of sales demonstrations while improving their quality and enabling other team members to present the material

sections.strDescription: Projility is a management and technology consulting firm that focuses on deployments of Microsoft Project Server, Project Online, SharePoint, and related Microsoft products.   As the Consulting Practice Manager, my primary goal was to keep revenue flowing into the company through it's main service offering.  This manifested primarily in sales support activities such as project scoping and client relationship management as well as project management activities.
